fields.name: Mild push
fields.description: A mild shove is given, furthering the melee.

fields.name: Pickle Bomb
fields.description: A jar of pickles materializes and in an attempt to open it, the jar is broken. This causes glass and brine and pickles to burst out in all directions unpredictably.

fields.name: Death Stare
fields.description: The stare lessens the firepower of ones foes.

fields.name: Read newspaper
fields.description: Knowledge of current events is a game changer.

fields.name: Belly slam
fields.description: Hips are rocked with the force of 1000 moons, slamming into the opponent and causing them to poop a little bit.

fields.name: Weiner Whack
fields.description: A weiner dog descends from the heavens, giving the opponent a solid thwack.

fields.name: A box of pancake batter
fields.description: An image of golden flapjacks adorns the cover. You pour the powder into your mouth and chew/inhale. You feel more hardy.

fields.name: Hearty Porridge
fields.description: This porridge tastes delicious. You detect a hint of leek. This gives you more energy.

fields.name: Anger Juice
fields.description:
Anger Juice is not recommended for pregnant women and men over the age of 50.
Discontinue drinking Anger Juice if you experience compulsive
behaviors, hallucinations, nausea, sleepwalking, and bloody stools.
You should have talked to your doctor
to ask if Anger Juice is right for you. After downing the shot,
you feel slightly irritable.

fields.name: A dusty graham cracker
fields.description: After blowing dust off of the graham cracker, you munch into it. It is stale but acceptable.

fields.name: A shot of espresso
fields.description: Sipping it from the tiny cup (you are sure it's called a demitasse), you feel some bravado well up within you.

fields.name: Ground up monkey bones
fields.description: You spit in the monkey bone powder to make a paste. You rub the paste\non your face. It tingles. You feel more unpredictable as\na result.

fields.name: Large Rat
fields.description: It is a humongous asshole, with its fangs and claws all wiggly and sharp.

fields.name: Wraith
fields.description: Its ghoulish frame wafts menacingly in the stifling, air-free room.

fields.name: Cannonball Bill
fields.description: A hulky figure who smells like burnt blood.

fields.name: Harold Halfthorssen
fields.description: Harold faked his death by baby arm! It turns out his baby arm has only made him stronger! He is incredibly angry that you've barged into his home. End his misery once and for all!
